channel.title: Client
channel.description: My client is done how do i put it up on the internet so people can download it?

item.title: Client
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:12, topic:275956”][quote author=4you111 link=topic=364497.msg2771143#msg2771143 date=1241133320]
What losers Geeks get a life and stop checking this post every minute to check for my replies ~lol
[/quote]

Good guess… But seriously, you need to stop flaming players. Not only is it against the rules, but it’s immature and annoying. And seeing as you’re calling us ‘loser geeks’ I can just imagine your age and level of maturity. If you’re not going to respect these forums, then yeah, you should gtfo.[/quote]

And the way he is typing…

I’de say…Around 9 or 10? Hmm.

Read full topic

Two things…
Asking for rep is against the rules
He can’t rep because he has less than 15!

Anyway, why would i be jealous? Its not like i didnt know how to make a .zip and upload it…
[/quote]

lmao ur a loser cuse i got 10 reps and i can rep others so please gtfo… give ur self a break it will help the world[/quote]
